Hostiso, LLC is a privately held firm that has been providing premium managed services since 2010 in Canada, US, France, Germany, Singapore!

We are offering cloud based shared hosting with latest hardware, software and premium free support for anything even app related problems. With 1 click install you can setup over 400 apps, WordPress, openCart, Joomla, NextCloud and much more ...

Order now and enjoy for first 3 months at 90% discount! CODE: WHTSHARED

With every shared hosting package we offer premium futures for FREE:

===================================================================

  • cPanel as control panel
  • Free Domain
  • Free Migrations
  • Free Backups: daily, weekly, monthly
  • Premium 24/7/365 Support
  • One Click Software Installer
  • SSD Cloud Storage
  • LiteSpeed Enterprise WebServer
  • Full HTTP/2 and QUIC support
  • MariaDB
  • Multiple PHP Versions
  • Free SSL Certificate
  • FFMPEG enabled
  • redis caching enabled
  • CloudFlare Enabled
  • 700gbps DDOS Protection
